MRRL Research
================

Single-robot Reinforcement Learning
------------------------------------

We first provide several implements of state-of-the-art single-robot reinforcement learning baselines which includes:

- DQN
- Doublee-q learning
- Actor-critic
- DDPG
- SAC
- TD3
- PPO

Multi-robot Reinforcement Learning
-----------------------------------
Besides,  we also provide several implements of state-of-the-art multi-robot reinforcement learning baselines which includes:

- Independent Q-learning
- IPPO
- MAPPO
- MADDPG
- QMIX
- VDN
- COMA
- MAAC
- HRL
- Shapley PPO
- Others
